1. Programming environment:
-------------------------
	
	Python v 2.7


2. To run the program, in the file directory give the command:
——————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————
	
	python 112026646_HW1.py <rs> <k> <filepath of word_100.txt> 


3. Worst case time complexity: 
————————————————————————————-
	
	O(n1*n2)	, where n1 = rs 
				n2 = k


4. Sample result 1: 
————————————————
(INPUT: rs<=10000, k <= 190): The program runs within 10 minutes for randomized layout with value(rs) upto 10000 and number of iterations(k) upto 190.

Below is the output for this case:

0.21000000000000002
0.12388486805069501
0.0996680557263381

5. Sample result 2:
—————————————————
(VERY LARGE INPUT: rs>10000, k > 200): The program terminates after about 10 minutes(560 second = 9.2 minutes) for very large input sizes. However it does 2*10^6 iterations before terminating
which are sufficient to consider the returned value as optimal so the result can be considered as solution.

Below is the output for this case:(with time exceeded message)

0.21000000000000002
0.12388486805069501
0.0996680557263381
